fixed.comment_en: Description: Used to detect data corruption in the ICMPv6 message and parts of the IPv6 header.For the calculation method,see Calculating checksum manually. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes.

variable.name: data
variable.comment_cn: 描述：数据。 数据类型：ASCII码。
variable.comment_en: Description: Data. Data type:ascii code.

fixed.name: unused
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：未用字段。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。 约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Unused field. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes. Constraints:must be zero.

variable.name: data
variable.comment_cn: 描述：数据包被丢弃的部分。 数据类型：ASCII码。
variable.comment_en: Description: Discarded part of data packet. Data type: ASCII code.

fixed.name: mtu
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：MTU。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description:MTU. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

variable.name: data
variable.comment_cn: 描述：数据包被丢弃的部分。 数据类型：ASCII码。
variable.comment_en: Description: Discarded part of data packet. Data type: ASCII code.

fixed.name: pointer
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：指针。 数据类型：长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Pointer. Data type: Hexadecimal,4 bytes .

variable.name: data
variable.comment_cn: 描述：数据包被丢弃的部分。 数据类型：ASCII码。
variable.comment_en: Description: Discarded part of data packet. Data type: ASCII code.

fixed.name: id
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：与序列号一起使用，用于回送应答报文与回送请求报文进行匹配的标记。 数据类型：十进制长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Together with the Sequence Number,used to mark the matching of Echo Reply message and Echo Request message. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: sequence_number
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：与标识符一起使用，用于回送应答报文与回送请求报文进行匹配的标记。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Together with Identifier,used to mark the matching of Echo Reply message and Echo Request message. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

variable.name: data
variable.comment_cn: 描述：通信数据。 数据类型：ASCII码。
variable.comment_en: Description: Communication data. Data type: ASCII code.

fixed.name: maximum_response_delay
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示响应时间的最大值（毫秒数），在这段时间内，多播组成员必须使用MLD多播侦听报告报文来报告它的成员身份。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the maximum value of the response time(milliseconds),during this time,multicast group member must use MLD multicast listening report packet to report its membership. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: unused
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: multicast_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：对于一般查询，多播地址字段值为未指定地址（::）。而对于指定多播地址查询，多播地址字段的值为被查询的指定多播地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: For general query,the value of the multicast address field is unspecified address(::).For specified multicast address query,the value of the multicast address field is the queried specified multicast address. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：这个字段未使用，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

loop.comment_cn: 描述：邻居请求选项。
loop.comment_en: Description: Neighbor request option.

fixed.name: cur_hop_limit
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：默认值应当等于发送的IP包头的跳数限制字段，值为0表示未规定。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The default value should be placed in the Hop Count field of the IP header for outgoing IP packets.A value of zero means unspecified. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

masked.name: flags_(M+O)
masked.comment_cn: 标志、优先级、保留位。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: Flag,precedence,Reserved. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte.

bit.name: managed_address_configuration
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置1时，主机除使用无状态地址自动配置以外，还使用管理协议进行地址自动配置。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1, hosts use the administered (stateful) protocol for address autoconfiguration in addition to any addresses autoconfigured using stateless address autoconfiguration.

bit.name: other_stateful_configuration
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置1时，主机使用管理（状态）协议对其它（非地址）信息进行自动配置。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1, hosts use the administered (stateful) protocol for autoconfiguration of other (non-address) information.

bit.name: local_agent
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置1时，表示发出这个路由器公告报文的路由器也可以作为IPv6移动节点的本地代理。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1,specifies that the router sending the router advertisement message can act as the local agent of the IPv6 moving node.

bit.name: default_router_PRI
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示这个路由器作为默认路由器的优先级
bit.comment_en: Description: Specifies the priority of the router as default router.

bit.name: reserved
bit.comment_cn: 描述：这个字段未使用，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。
bit.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver.

fixed.name: router_lifetime
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：生存期与默认路由器有关，以秒为单位。最大值为18.2h。0值表示不是默认路由器，不应该出现在默认路由器列表中。路由器生存期仅适用于默认路由器，不适用于包含在其它消息字段或选项中的信息。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节
fixed.comment_en: Description: The lifetime associated with the default router in units of seconds. The maximum value corresponds to 18.2 hours. A Lifetime of 0 indicates that the router is not a default router and should not appear on the default router list. The Router Lifetime applies only to the router's usefulness as a default router; it does not apply to information contained in other message fields or options. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: reachable_time
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：以毫秒为单位。可到达时间用于邻居不可达检测算法，值为0时表示未规定。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description:The time,in milliseconds, Used by the Neighbor Unreachability Detection algorithm. A value of zero means unspecified. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: retrans_time
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：以毫秒为单位，重传邻居请求消息之间的时间间隔，用于地址解析和邻居不可达检测算法，值为0时表示未规定。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The time,in milliseconds, between retransmitted Neighbor Solicitation messages.Used by address resolution and the Neighbor Unreachability Detection algorithm. A value of zero means unspecified. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

loop.comment_cn: 描述：邻居请求选项。
loop.comment_en: Description: Neighbor Solicitation Option.

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：这个字段未使用，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十进制。长度为4个字节。约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes. Constraints: Must be zero.

fixed.name: Destination_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：所请求的目标IP地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The IP address of the Destination of the solicitation. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

loop.name: NeigSolLoop
loop.comment_cn: 描述：邻居请求选项。
loop.comment_en: Description: Neighbor Solicitation Option.

masked.name: flags_(R+S+O)
masked.comment_cn: 描述：标志 R S O。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为4个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: Flags R S O. Data type: Hexadecimal,4 bytes.

bit.name: router_flag
bit.comment_cn: 描述：设置为1时，表示发送方为路由器。邻居不可达检测使用该位来检测路由器到主机的改变。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1, the R-bit indicates that the sender is a router. The R-bit is used by Neighbor Unreachability Detection to detect a router that changes to a host.

bit.name: solicited_flag
bit.comment_cn: 描述：设置为1时，表示从目的地址发送的公告消息，作为对邻居请求的响应。该位用来作为邻居不可达检测的可达性确认。在组播公告或非请求单播公告中不能设置这一项。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1, the S-bit indicates that the advertisement was sent in response to a Neighbor Solicitation from the Destination address.The S-bit is used as a reachability confirmation for Neighbor Unreachability Detection. It must not be set in multicast advertisements or in unsolicited unicast advertisements.

bit.name: override_flag
bit.comment_cn: 描述；设置为1时，表示公告应当替换已存在的缓存表项，更新缓存的链路层地址；未设置时，公告不能更新缓存的链路层地址，虽然它会更新链路层地址未知的邻居缓存表项。在泛播地址的请求公告和非请求公告中不应设置这一项，而在其它请求公告和非请求公告中应该设置这一项。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1, the O-bit indicates that the advertisement should override an existing cache entry and update the cached link-layer address.When it is not set the advertisement will not update a cached link-layer address though it will update an existing Neighbor Cache entry for which no link-layer address is known. It should not be set in solicited advertisements for anycast addresses and in solicited proxy advertisements.It should be set in other solicited advertisements and in unsolicited advertisements.

bit.name: reserved
bit.comment_cn: 描述：29位未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。
bit.comment_en: Description: 29-bit unused field.It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver.

fixed.name: Destination_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：目标地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Destination Address. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

loop.comment_cn: 描述：邻居公告。
loop.comment_en: Description: Neighbor Advertisement .

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。 约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes. Constraints: Must be zero.

fixed.name: Destination_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：到达ICMP目的地址的更佳的下一跳IP地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The better next hop IP address arriving at the ICMP destination address. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

fixed.name: destination_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：重定向到目标的目的IP地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The destination IP address redirected to the Destination. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

loop.name: redirOption
loop.comment_cn: 描述：重定向选项。
loop.comment_en: Description: Redirect option.

fixed.name: ndotype
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：选项类型标识符。具体定义如下：1 链路层地址；2 目的链路层地址；3 前缀信息；4 重定向；5 MTU; 7 公告间隔; 8 本地代理信息; 9 路由信息。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Option type identifier.Its definition is as following:1 Link-Layer Address;2 Destination Link-Layer Address;3 Prefix Information;4 Redirected Header; 5 MTU ;7 advertisement interval;8 local agent information;9 route information. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

fixed.name: length
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：选项的长度（包括类型和长度字段）以8字节为单位，0值是无效的。结点必须自动丢弃包含了长度为0的选项的数据包。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The length of the option(including type and length field),in 8 bytes,0 is invalid.

checkfield.name: chklen
checkfield.comment_cn: 必须满足：有效载荷长度 >= 1。

fixed.name: link_layer_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：长度可变的链路层地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为6个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The variable length link-layer address. Data type: Hexadecimal,6 bytes.

fixed.name: link_layer_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：长度可变的链路层地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为6个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description:The variable length link-layer address. Data type: Hexadecimal,6 bytes.

fixed.name: prefix_length
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：前缀长度。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Prefix length. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

masked.name: flags(L+A)
masked.showname_cn: 标志 L A R S
masked.comment_cn: 描述：标志L A R S。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description:flags L A R S. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte.

bit.name: L
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当设置为1时，表示前缀用于ON_LINK确定；当未设置时，公告对前缀的on-link和off-link属性不作声明。前缀可以用于地址的配置，一些地址的前缀属于on-link，另一些地址的前缀属于off-link。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set to 1, indicates that this prefix can be used for on-link determination. When not set the advertisement makes no statement about on-link or off-link properties of the prefix. The prefix might be used for address configuration with some of the addresses belonging to the prefix being on-link and others being off-link.

bit.name: A
bit.comment_cn: 描述：自治地址配置标志位。指明该前缀信息是否可用于地址的自动配置。
bit.comment_en: Description:autonomous address-configuration flag.Indicates whether this prefix can be used for autonomous address configuration or not.

bit.name: R
bit.comment_cn: 描述：路由器地址标志。当置1时，表示前缀字段中也包含了分配给发送路由器公告报文的路由器的IPv6地址。
bit.comment_en: Description: Router address flag.When set to 1,it specifies that the prefix field also includes the IPv6 address of the router assigned to sending router advertisement message.

bit.name: S
bit.comment_cn: 描述：站点前缀标志。当置1时，表示使用前缀字段和由站点前缀长度字段定义的站点前缀来更新站点前缀表。
bit.comment_en: Description: Station perfix flag.When set,it means using the prefix field and the station prefix defined by the station prefix length field to update the station prefix list.

bit.name: reserved_1
bit.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。
bit.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver.

fixed.name: valid_lifetime
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：以秒计（相对于数据包发送的时间），前缀用于on-link确定的有效时间长度，全1的值（0xffffffff）表示无穷大。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The length of time in seconds (relative to the time the data packet is sent that the prefix is valid for the purpose of on-link determination. A value of all one bits (0xffffffff) represents infinity. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: preferred_lifetime
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：以秒计（相对于数据包发送的时间），通过无状态地址自动配置从前缀产生的地址保持首选的时间长度，全1的值（0xffffffff）表示无穷大。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The length of time in seconds (relative to the time the data packet is sent)that addresses generated from the prefix via stateless address autoconfiguration remain preferred. A value of all one bits (0xffffffff) represents infinity. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: reserved_2
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留字。 数据类型：十进制，长度为3个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,3 bytes.

fixed.name: station_prefix_len
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：仅当站点前缀标志为1时，该字段才有意义。表示通过无状态地址自动配置协议所产生的IPv6地址的前缀。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Valid only when the station prefix flag is 1.specifies the IPv6 address prefix created by stateless address auto config protocol. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

fixed.name: prefix
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：IP地址的前缀。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: A prefix of an IP address. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为6个字节
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Hexadecimal,6 bytes.

variable.name: redirect_data
variable.comment_cn: 描述：重定向数据包部分。 数据类型：十六进制。
variable.comment_en: Description: Redirect packet part. Data type: Hexadecimal.

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field. It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: MTU
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：是链路推荐的MTU值。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The recommended MTU for the link. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field.It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: interval
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：规定了本地代理所连续发送的自发的多播路由器公告报文间的最大时间间隔，单位为毫秒。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the maximum time interval of the multicast advertisement message sending continually by the local agent,in seconds. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: reserved
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。 约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description: An unused field.It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes. Constraints: Must be zero.

fixed.name: R
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示向移动节点发出地址的本地代理的优先级。优先级用于对本地代理发送给移动节点的地址进行排序。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the priority of the local agent sending the address to the moving node.The priority is used to sort the address sending to the moving node by the local agent. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: L
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示以秒为单位的本地代理的生存期。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the time to live in seconds of the local agent. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: prefixlen
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示对路由有意义的前缀字段中的前缀的位数。它的取值范围为0到128。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the number of bits in the prefix field meaningful to the route.It ranges between 0 and 128. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

masked.name: reserved
masked.comment_cn: 描述：保留/优先级。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: Reserved/Preference. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte.

bit.name: reserved1
bit.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。
bit.comment_en: Description:It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver.

bit.name: PRI
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示包含在路由信息选项中的路由的优先级。如果多个路由器使用路由信息选项公告同一个前缀，则可以通过配置路由器，使它们公告的路由具有不同的优先级。01表示高；00表示中等；11表示低。
bit.comment_en: Description: Specifies the priority of the route included in the route information option.If many routers advertise the same prefix using the route information option,we can make the route have different priority by configuring the routers.01 means high;00 means middle;11 means low.

bit.name: reserved2
bit.comment_cn: 描述：未使用的字段，发送方必须初始化为0，同时接收方必须忽略。
bit.comment_en: Description: It must be initialized to zero by the sender and must be ignored by the receiver.

fixed.name: routelife
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示用于确定路由的前缀处于有效状态的时间(秒数)。如果路由生存期字段的值为0xFFFFFFFF，则表示路由生存期为永远。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the time(seconds) needed to confirm that the router prefix is in valid state.A value of 0xFFFFFFFF means the route time to live is infinity. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: IPv6_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示路由的前缀。如果前缀长度为0，则前缀字段的长度为0；如果前缀长度大于0小于64，则前缀长度为64；如果前缀长度大于64，则前缀字段的长度为128位。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为8个字节
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the route prefix.If prefix length is 0,then the length of the prefix field is 0;If prefix length is greater than 0 and less than 64,then the prefix length is 64;If prefix length is greater than 64,then the length of the prefix field is 128 bits. Data type: Hexadecimal,8 bytes.

fixed.name: IPv6_address
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示路由的前缀。如果前缀长度为0，则前缀字段的长度为0；如果前缀长度大于0小于64，则前缀长度为64；如果前缀长度大于64，则前缀字段的长度为128位。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Specifies the route prefix.If prefix length is 0,then the length of the prefix field is 0;If prefix length is greater than 0 and less than 64,then the prefix length is 64;If prefix length is greater than 64,then the length of the prefix field is 128 bits. Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes.

case.show_en: Destination communication was prohibited by management

fixed.name: version
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：OSPF协议版本号。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。 约束：本协议为3。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The OSPF protocol version number. Data type: Decimal,1 byte. Constraints: This protocol is 3.

fixed.name: type
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：OSPF协议类型。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。 约束：取值见下拉列表。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The OSPF protocol types. Data type: Decimal,1 byte. Constraints: For values,see the drop-down list.

fixed.name: packetlength
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：整个OSPF包以字节计算的长度，包括标准的OSPF包头。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The length of the OSPF protocol packet in bytes,including the standard OSPF header. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: routerID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：路由器本身的标识（表明谁发起此包）。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The router identifier(indicates who originates the data packet). Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: areaID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：此包发送的OSPF区域。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The area that this packet belongs to. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: checksum
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：OSPF使用标准的校验和计算方法。伪字头的上层数据包长度字段设置为OSPF数据包长度字段值，伪字头的下一个字段值是89。如果数据包的长度不是16位的整数，数据包在计算校验和前对不足位补0。在计算校验和前，OSPF数据包中的校验和字段置为0。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: OSPF uses standard checksum calculation method.The Upper-Layer Packet Length in the pseudo-header is set to value of the OSPF packet header's length field. The Next Header value used in the pseudo-header is 89. If the data packet's length is not an integral number of 16-bit words, the data packet is padded with a byte of zero before checksumming. Before computing the checksum, the checksum field in the OSPF packet header is set to 0. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: instanceID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：使OSPF的多个实例能在单个链路上运行。每个协议实例会被分配一个单独的实例ID；实例ID仅具有本地链路意义，如果收到的数据包的ID与收到接收接口的ID不符，将被丢弃。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Enables multiple instances of OSPF to be run over a single link.Each protocol instance would be assigned a separate Instance ID;the Instance ID has local link significance only. Received packets whose Instance ID is not equal to the receiving interface's Instance ID are discarded. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

fixed.name: interfaceID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：用来惟一标识路由器上的一个接口。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Uniquely identify an interface of the router. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: rtrPri
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：用于指派路由器选举。如设置为0，表示路由器成为指派路由器是不合法的。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Used in Designated Router election.If set to 0, the router will be ineligible to become Designated Router. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

masked.name: options1
masked.showname_cn: 通过路由器的可选能力支持
masked.showname_en: The optional capabilities supported by the router
masked.comment_cn: 描述：通过路由器的可选能力支持。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为2个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: The optional capabilities supported by the router. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes.

bit.name: res
bit.comment_cn: 描述：保留位。 约束：必须为0。
bit.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Constraints: Must be zero.

masked.name: options2
masked.showname_cn: 描述：通过路由器的可选能力支持。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.showname_en: Description:the optional capabilities supported by the router. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte.

bit.name: DCbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：描述了路由器需求环路的处理。
bit.comment_en: Description: Specifies processing of router demand circuit loop.

bit.name: Rbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示源是否为激活的路由器。置0时表示不能计算穿越公告节点的路由器。对于需要参加与路由器但不需要转发非本地地址包的多穴主机应该将该位置0。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit (the 'Router' bit) indicates whether the originator is an active router.If the router bit is clear routes which transit the advertising node cannot be computed.Clearing the router bit would be appropriate for a multi-homed host that wants to participate in routing, but does not want to forward non-locally addressed packets.

bit.name: Nbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：描述类型7的LSA的处理。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit describes the handling of Type-7 LSAs

bit.name: MCbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示是否转发IP组播报文。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit describes whether IP multicast datagrams are forwarded.

bit.name: Ebit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示AS-external-LSAs洪泛的方式。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit describes the way AS-external-LSAs are flooded

bit.name: V6bit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：如果V6置0，表示路由器/链路不在IPv6路由运算的范围内。
bit.comment_en: Description: If this bit is clear, the router/link should be excluded from IPv6 routing calculations.

fixed.name: helloInterval
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：路由器发送Hello包相间隔的秒数。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The number of seconds between this router's Hello packets. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: routerDeadInterval
fixed.comment_cn: 描述；路由器失效之前的秒数。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The number of seconds before declaring a silent router down. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: designatedRouterID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：网络中指派路由器的标识。指派路由器由它的路由器ID标识，在没有指派路由器的情况下设为0.0.0.0。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The identity of the Designated Router for this network, in the view of the sending router. The Designated Router is identified by its Router ID. Set to 0.0.0.0 if there is no Designated Router. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: backupDesignatedRouterID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：网络中备份指派路由器的标识。备份指派路由器由它的路由器ID标识，在没有备份指派路由器的情况下设为0.0.0.0。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The identity of the Backup Designated Router for this network,in the view of the sending router.The Backup Designated Router is identified by its IP Router ID.Set to 0.0.0.0 if there is no Backup Designated Router. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

loop.name: payload
loop.comment_cn: 描述：邻居列表。
loop.comment_en: Description: Neighbor list.

fixed.name: neighborID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：网络上最近有效的“Hello”包中的所有路由器的ID号。“最近”指在上一个路由器死亡间隔内。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router IDs of each router from whom valid Hello packets have been seen recently on the network. Recently means in the last RouterDeadInterval seconds. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：00填充位。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: 00 padding bits. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

masked.name: options1
masked.showname_cn: 通过路由器的可选能力支持
masked.showname_en: The optional capabilities supported by the router
masked.comment_cn: 描述：通过路由器的可选能力支持。
masked.comment_en: Description: The optional capabilities supported by the router.

bit.name: res
bit.comment_cn: 描述：保留位。 约束：必须为0。
bit.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Constraints: Must be zero.

masked.name: options2
masked.showname_en: Description: The optional capabilities supported bythe router. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte..
masked.showname_cn: 描述：通过路由器的可选能力支持。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。

bit.name: DCbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：描述了路由器需求环路的处理。
bit.comment_en: Description: Specifies processing of router demand circuit loop.

bit.name: Rbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示源是否为激活的路由器。置0时表示不能计算穿越公告节点的路由器。对于需要参加与路由器但不需要转发非本地地址包的多穴主机应该将该位置0。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit (the 'Router' bit) indicates whether the originator is an active router.If the router bit is clear routes which transit the advertising node cannot be computed.Clearing the router bit would be appropriate for a multi-homed host that wants to participate in routing, but does not want to forward non-locally addressed packets.

bit.name: Nbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：描述类型7的LSA的处理。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit describes the handling of Type-7 LSAs

bit.name: MCbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示是否转发IP组播报文。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit describes whether IP multicast datagrams are forwarded.

bit.name: Ebit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：表示AS-external-LSAs洪泛的方式。
bit.comment_en: Description: This bit describes the way AS-external-LSAs are flooded

bit.name: V6bit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：如果V6置0，表示路由器/链路不在IPv6路由运算的范围内。
bit.comment_en: Description: If this bit is clear, the router/link should be excluded from IPv6 routing calculations.

fixed.name: interfaceMTU
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：表示发送到相关接口上不分段的IPv6数据包的最大字节长度。在虚链路上发送数据库描述包时，“接口MTU”应置为0。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The size in bytes of the largest IPv6 datagram that can be sent out the associated interface, without fragmentation.Interface MTU should be set to 0 in Database Description packets sent over virtual links. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：00填充位。 数据类型：十进制名，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: 00 padding bits. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

masked.name: DDoptions
masked.comment_cn: 描述：数据库描述选项。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: Database description option. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

bit.name: res
bit.comment_cn: 描述：保留位。 约束：必须为0。
bit.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Constraints: Must be zero.

bit.name: Ibit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：初始位。设为1时表示此数据包是数据库描述包序列中的第一个包。
bit.comment_en: Description: The Init bit.When set to 1,this packet is the first in the sequence of Database Description Packets.

bit.name: Mbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：后继位。设为1时表示随后有更多的数据库描述包。
bit.comment_en: Description: The More bit. When set to 1, it indicates that more Database Description Packets are to follow.

bit.name: MSbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：主/从位。设为1表示路由器在数据库交换处理中为主路由器，否则为从路由器。
bit.comment_en: Description: The Master/Slave bit.When set to 1,it indicates that the router is the master during the Database Exchange process.Otherwise,the router is the slave.

fixed.name: DDsequenceNumber
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：用来为收集到的数据库描述包排序。初始值应为惟一，之后逐渐递增直到全部发送完数据库描述。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。约束：初始值为1。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Used to sequence the collection of Database Description Packets.The initial value should be unique.The DD sequence number then increments until the complete database description has been sent. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes . Constraints: The initial value is 1.

loop.name: LSAh
loop.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态头列表。
loop.comment_en: Description: Link state header list.

loop.name: payload
loop.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态请求列表。
loop.comment_en: Description: Link state request list

fixed.name: numberLSA
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：需要更新的LSA数。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description:The number of LSAs included in this update. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

loop.name: Lsapayload
loop.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态数据。
loop.comment_en: Description: Link state data.

loop.name: LSAh
loop.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态头列表。
loop.comment_en: Description: Link state header list.

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：00 00填充标记。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。约束：必须为0000
fixed.comment_en: Description: 00 00 padding mark. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes. Constraints: Must be 0000.

fixed.name: LStype
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：指明了该LSA的特定功能。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。 约束：1：路由器LSA；2：网络LSA；3：域间前缀LSA；4：域间路由器LSA；5：AS外部LSA；6：组成员LSA；7：第七类LSA；8：链路LSA；9：域内前缀LSA。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Indicates the LSA's specific functionality. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes . Constraints: 1: Route-LSA; 2: Network-LSA; 3: Inter-Area_Prefix-LSA; 4: Inter-Area-Router-LSA; 5: AS-External-LSA; 6: Group-membership-LSA; 7: Type-7-LSA; 8: Link-LSA; 9: Intra-Area-Prefix-LSA.

fixed.name: LSID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态ID与LS类型和公告路由器一起惟一地识别链路状态数据库里的LSA。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Together with LS type and Advertising Router,uniquely identify the LSA in the link-state database. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: advertisingRouter
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：生成LSA的路由器的路由器ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router ID of the router that originated the LSA. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: LSage
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：LSA生成以来的时间，以秒为单位。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节
fixed.comment_en: Description: The time in seconds since the LSA was originated. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

masked.name: DDoptions
masked.comment_cn: 描述：表示由该LSA完成的功能。LS类型的前三位是对LSA一般属性的编码，其余的表示该LSA的特定功能。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为2个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: The LS type field indicates the function performed by the LSA.The high-order three bits of LS type encode generic properties of the LSA, while the remainder indicate the LSA's specific functionality. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes .

bit.name: Ubit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：指示一台不识别该LSA功能码的路由器应如何处理这种类型的LSA。为0时，作为具有链路本地范泛范围的LSA进行处理；为1时，作为可识别的类型的LSA进行储存并洪泛。
bit.comment_en: Description: The U bit indicates how the LSA should be handled by a router which does not recognize the LSA's function code.When its value is 0,treat the LSA as if it had link-local flooding scope;When its value is 1,store and flood the LSA, as if type understood.

bit.name: S2bit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：S1和S2指出该LSA的洪泛范围。00：链路本地范围，仅在生成的链路上洪泛；01：区域范围，在生成的区域内所有路由器上洪泛；10：AS范围，在AS内所有的路由器上洪泛；11：保留。
bit.comment_en: Description: The S1 and S2 bits indicate the flooding scope of the LSA.The values are: 00: Link-Local Scoping. Flooded only on link it is originated on; 01: Area Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the originating area; 10:AS Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the AS; 11:Reserved.

bit.name: S1bit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：S1和S2指出该LSA的洪泛范围。00：链路本地范围，仅在生成的链路上洪泛；01：区域范围，在生成的区域内所有路由器上洪泛；10：AS范围，在AS内所有的路由器上洪泛；11：保留。
bit.comment_en: Description: The S1 and S2 bits indicate the flooding scope of the LSA.The values are: 00: Link-Local Scoping. Flooded only on link it is originated on; 01: Area Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the originating area; 10:AS Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the AS; 11:Reserved.

bit.name: LSAfunctionCode
bit.comment_cn: 描述：指明了该LSA的特定功能。1：路由器LSA；2：网络LSA；3：域间前缀LSA；4：域间路由器LSA；5：AS外部LSA；6：组成员LSA；7：第七类LSA；8：链路LSA；9：域内前缀LSA。
bit.comment_en: Description:indicates the LSA's specific functionality. 1: Route-LSA; 2: Network-LSA; 3: Inter-Area_Prefix-LSA; 4: Inter-Area-Router-LSA; 5: AS-External-LSA; 6: Group-membership-LSA; 7: Type-7-LSA; 8: Link-LSA; 9: Intra-Area-Prefix-LSA.

fixed.name: linkStateID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态ID与LS类型和公告路由器一起惟一地识别链路状态数据库里的LSA。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Together with LS type and Advertising Router, uniquely identify the LSA in the link-state database. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: advertisingRouter
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：生成LSA的路由器的路由器ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router ID of the router that originated the LSA. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: LSsequence
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：检测旧的或重复的LSA。连续LSA实例要给定连续的LS序号。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Detects old or duplicate LSAs.Successive instances of an LSA are given successive LS sequence numbers. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: LSchecksum
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：该LSA所有内容（包括除LS年龄字段外的LSA头）的校验和。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The checksum of the complete contents of the LSA,including the LSA header but excluding the LS age field. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: length
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：以字节计的LSA长度，包括20字节的LSA头。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The length in bytes of the LSA.This includes the 20 byte LSA header. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: LSage
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：LSA生成以来的时间，以秒为单位。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The time in seconds since the LSA was originated. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

masked.name: DDoptions
masked.comment_cn: 描述：表示由该LSA完成的功能。LS类型的前三位是对LSA一般属性的编码，其余的表示该LSA的特定功能。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为2个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: The LS type field indicates the function performed by the LSA.The high-order three bits of LS type encode generic properties of the LSA, while the remainder indicate the LSA's specific functionality. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes .

bit.name: Ubit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：指示一台不识别该LSA功能码的路由器应如何处理这种类型的LSA。为0时，作为具有链路本地范泛范围的LSA进行处理；为1时，作为可识别的类型的LSA进行储存并洪泛。
bit.comment_en: Description: The U bit indicates how the LSA should be handled by a router which does not recognize the LSA's function code.When its value is 0,treat the LSA as if it had link-local flooding scope;When its value is 1,store and flood the LSA, as if type understood.

bit.name: S2bit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：S1和S2指出该LSA的洪泛范围。00：链路本地范围，仅在生成的链路上洪泛；01：区域范围，在生成的区域内所有路由器上洪泛；10：AS范围，在AS内所有的路由器上洪泛；11：保留。
bit.comment_en: Description: The S1 and S2 bits indicate the flooding scope of the LSA.The values are: 00: Link-Local Scoping. Flooded only on link it is originated on; 01: Area Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the originating area; 10:AS Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the AS; 11:Reserved.

bit.name: S1bit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：S1和S2指出该LSA的洪泛范围。00：链路本地范围，仅在生成的链路上洪泛；01：区域范围，在生成的区域内所有路由器上洪泛；10：AS范围，在AS内所有的路由器上洪泛；11：保留。
bit.comment_en: Description:The S1 and S2 bits indicate the flooding scope of the LSA.The values are: 00: Link-Local Scoping. Flooded only on link it is originated on; 01: Area Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the originating area; 10:AS Scoping. Flooded to all routers in the AS; 11:Reserved.

bit.name: LSAfunctionCode
bit.comment_cn: 描述：指明了该LSA的特定功能。1：路由器LSA；2：网络LSA；3：域间前缀LSA；4：域间路由器LSA；5：AS外部LSA；6：组成员LSA；7：第七类LSA；8：链路LSA；9：域内前缀LSA。
bit.comment_en: Description: Indicates the LSA's specific functionality. 1: Route-LSA; 2: Network-LSA; 3: Inter-Area_Prefix-LSA; 4: Inter-Area-Router-LSA; 5: AS-External-LSA; 6: Group-membership-LSA; 7: Type-7-LSA; 8: Link-LSA; 9: Intra-Area-Prefix-LSA.

fixed.name: linkStateID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：链路状态ID与LS类型和公告路由器一起惟一地识别链路状态数据库里的LSA。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Together with LS type and Advertising Router, uniquely identify the LSA in the link-state database. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: advertisingRouter
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：生成LSA的路由器的路由器ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router ID of the router that originated the LSA. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: LSsequence
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：检测旧的或重复的LSA。连续LSA实例要给定连续的LS序号。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description:Detects old or duplicate LSAs.Successive instances of an LSA are given successive LS sequence numbers. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: LSchecksum
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：该LSA所有内容（包括除LS年龄字段外的LSA头）的校验和。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The checksum of the complete contents of the LSA,including the LSA header but excluding the LS age field. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: length
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：以字节计的LSA长度，包括20字节的LSA头。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: LSA length in bytes,including 20 bytes LSA header. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

masked.name: options
masked.comment_cn: 描述：选项。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: Option. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte .

bit.name: Wbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置位时，该路由器是通配符的组播接收者。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set,the router is a wild-card multicast receiver.

bit.name: Vbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置位时，路由器是一个或多个完全相邻的虚链路的端点，该虚链路所描述的区域为穿越域。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set, the router is an endpoint of one or more fully adjacent virtual links having the described area as Transit area .

bit.name: Ebit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置位时，该路由器是AS的边界路由器。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set,the router is an AS boundary router.

bit.name: Bbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：当置位时，该路由器是区域边界路由器。
bit.comment_en: Description: When set, the router is an area border router .

loop.name: RouterPayl
loop.comment_cn: 描述：路由器有效负载。
loop.comment_en: Description: Router payload.

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

loop.name: NetworkPayload
loop.comment_cn: 描述：附加路由器。
loop.comment_en: Description: Attached Router.

fixed.name: attachedRouter
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：相连路由器。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Connection router. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,1 byte.

fixed.name: metrics
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：该路由的费用，与路由器LSA里接口费用使用相同的单位。当域间前缀LSA描述了到一段地址的路由时，费用被置为到地址段内的任意可到达地址的最大费用。 数据类型：十六进制，长度3个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The cost of this route. Expressed in the same units as the interface costs in the router-LSAs. When the Inter-Area-Prefix-LSA is describing a route to a range of addresses the cost is set to the maximum cost to any reachable component of the address range. Data type: Hexadecimal,3 bytes.

fixed.name: prefixLength_3
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：是该前缀以位为单位的长度，是一个8位字段，描述与该前缀相关的各种能力。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: PrefixLength is the length in bits of the prefix,an 8-bit field,describes various capabilities associated with this prefix. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: prefixOptions
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：每个前缀选项都是与一个8位的能力字段一起公告，作为各种路由器计算的输入。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Each prefix option is advertised along with an 8-bit field of capabilities,as inputs for various routing calculations. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。 约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes . Constraints:must be zero.

variable.name: addressPrefix
variable.comment_cn: 描述：是对该前缀的编码，应为32位字的偶数倍，根据需要添补0位，该编码占用（前缀长度+31）/32个32位字。 数据类型：十六进制。
variable.comment_en: Description: Address Prefix is an encoding of the prefix itself as an even multiple of 32-bit words,padding with zero bits as necessary;this encoding consumes (PrefixLength + 31)/32) 32-bit words. Data type: Hexadecimal.

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：保留。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。 约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Reserved. Data type: Decimal,1 byte . Constraints:must be zero.

fixed.name: metrics
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：该路由的费用，与路由器LSA里接口费用使用相同的单位。当域间前缀LSA描述了到一段地址的路由时，费用被置为到地址段内的任意可到达地址的最大费用。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为3个字节
fixed.comment_en: Description: The cost of this route. Expressed in the same units as the interface costs in the router-LSAs. When the Inter-Area-Prefix-LSA is describing a route to a range of addresses the cost is set to the maximum cost to any reachable component of the address range. Data type: Hexadecimal,3 bytes.

fixed.name: destinationRouterID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：LSA描述的路由器的路由器ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router ID of the router being described by the LSA. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

bit.name: Ebit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：外部度量的类型。置1，表示该度量大于任何AS内部路径；置0，表示它与链路状态度量的单位相同。
bit.comment_en: Description: The type of external metric. If bit E is set,this means the metric is considered larger than any intra-AS path;If bit E is zero,this means that it is expressed in the same units as the link state metric.

bit.name: Fbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：如果该位置1，该LSA中包含转发地址。
bit.comment_en: Description: If set, a Forwarding Address has been included in the LSA.

bit.name: Tbit
bit.comment_cn: 描述：如果该位置1，该LSA中包含外部类型标记。
bit.comment_en: If set, an External Route Tag has been included in the LSA.

fixed.name: metrics
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：路由的费用，取决于外部类型标记（上面的E位）。 数据类型：十六进制。长度为3个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The cost of this route. Interpretation depends on the external type indication (bit E above). Data type: Hexadecimal,3 bytes.

fixed.name: prefixLength_5
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：是该前缀以位为单位的长度，是一个8位字段，描述与该前缀相关的各种能力。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: PrefixLength is the length in bits of the prefix,an 8-bit field,describes various capabilities associated with this prefix. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: prefixOptions
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：每个前缀选项都是与一个8位的能力字段一起公告，作为各种路由器计算的输入。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Each prefix option is advertised along with an 8-bit field of capabilities,as inputs for various routing calculations. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: ReferenceLStype
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：如果为非0，LS类型为此值的LSA与该LSA相关。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: If non-zero, an LSA with this LS type is to be associated with this LSA. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

variable.name: addresPrefix
variable.comment_cn: 描述：是对该前缀的编码，应为32位字的偶数倍，根据需要添补0位，该编码占用（前缀长度+31）/32个32位字。 数据类型：十六进制。
variable.comment_en: Description: Address Prefix is an encoding of the prefix itself as an even multiple of 32-bit words,padding with zero bits as necessary;this encoding consumes (PrefixLength + 31)/32) 32-bit words. Data type: Hexadecimal.

fixed.name: forwardingAddres
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：完整的IPv6地址。仅当F置位时，LSA中包括转发地址。如果包括转发地址，到公告目的地的数据将被转发到此地址。转发地址不能置为未规定的IPv6地址（0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0）。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为16字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: A fully qualified IPv6 address.Included in the LSA if and only if bit F has been set. If included, Data traffic for the advertised destination will be forwarded to this address. Must not be set to the IPv6 Unspecified Address (0:0:0:0:0:0:0:0). Data type: Hexadecimal,16 bytes .

fixed.name: ExternalRouteTag
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：用来在AS边界路由器之间传达附加信息。只有T置位时，LSA中包括该标记。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Used to communicate additional information between AS boundary routers;Included in the LSA if and only if bit T has been set. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: referenceLink
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：只有参考LS类型非0，LSA中包括参考链路状态ID。如果包括参考链路状态ID，在LSA中可以找到有关公告的外部路由的附加信息，该LSA的LS类型等于“参考LS类型”，链路状态ID等于“参考链路状态ID”，并且公告路由器与AS外部LSA的链路状态头中指定的相同。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Included if and only if Reference LS Type is non-zero.If included, additional information concerning the advertised external route can be found in the LSA having LS type equal to Referenced LS Type, Link State ID equal to Referenced Link State ID and Advertising Router the same as that specifiedin the AS-external-LSA's link state header. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: rtrPri
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：把链路和发起路由器相连的接口的路由器优先级。 数据类型：十进制长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router Priority of the interface attaching the originating router to the link.. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte.

fixed.name: LLIA
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：在该链路上的发起路由器的链路本地接口地址。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description:The originating router’s link-local interface address on the link. Data type: Hexadecimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: numPrefix
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：在LSA中包含的IPv6地址前缀个数。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The number of IPv6 address prefixes contained in the LSA. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

loop.name: LsaLinkpayload
loop.comment_cn: 描述：LSA链路有效负载。
loop.comment_en: Description: LSA link payload

fixed.name: prefixLength_8
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：是该前缀以位为单位的长度，是一个8位字段，描述与该前缀相关的各种能力。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: PrefixLength is the length in bits of the prefix,an 8-bit field,describes various capabilities associated with this prefix. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: prefixOptions
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：每个前缀选项都是与一个8位的能力字段一起公告，作为各种路由器计算的输入。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Each prefix option is advertised along with an 8-bit field of capabilities,as inputs for various routing calculations. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

variable.name: addresPrefix
variable.comment_cn: 描述；是对该前缀的编码，应为32位字的偶数倍，根据需要添补0位，该编码占用（前缀长度+31）/32个32位字。 数据类型：十六进制。
variable.comment_en: Description: Address Prefix is an encoding of the prefix itself as an even multiple of 32-bit words,padding with zero bits as necessary;this encoding consumes (PrefixLength + 31)/32) 32-bit words. Data type: Hexadecimal.

fixed.name: numPrefix
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：在LSA中包含的IPv6地址前缀个数。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The number of IPv6 address prefixes contained in the LSA. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: ReferenceLStype
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：参考链路状态ID以及参考公告路由器，标识与IPv6地址前缀相关的路由器LSA或网络LSA。如果参考LS类型是1，该前缀与路由器LSA相关，参考链路状态ID应该是0，并且参考公告路由器应该是发起路由器的路由器ID；如果参考LS类型是2，该前缀与网络LSA相关，参考链路状态ID应该是链路指派路由器的接口ID，并且参考公告路由器应该是指派路由器的路由器ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Referenced Link State ID and Referenced Advertising Router,identify the router-LSA or network-LSA with which the IPv6 address prefixes should be associated. If Referenced LS type is 1,the prefixes are associated with a router-LSA, Referenced Link State ID should be 0 and Referenced Advertising Router should be the originating router's Router ID. If Referenced LS type is 2,the prefixes are associated with a network-LSA, Referenced Link State ID should be the Interface ID of the link's Designated Router and Referenced Advertising Router should be the DesignatedRouter's Router ID. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes .

fixed.name: referenceLinkStateID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：作用参见“参考LS类型”。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: See Referenced LS type. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

fixed.name: referenceAdvertisingRouter
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：作用参见“参考LS类型”。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: See Referenced LS type. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes .

loop.name: LsaIntrPayload
loop.comment_cn: 描述：LSA中断有效负载。
loop.comment_en: Description:LSA link payload

fixed.name: prefixLength_9
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：是该前缀以位为单位的长度，是一个8位字段，描述与该前缀相关的各种能力。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: PrefixLength is the length in bits of the prefix,an 8-bit field,describes various capabilities associated with this prefix. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: prefixOptions
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：每个前缀选项都是与一个8位的能力字段一起公告，作为各种路由器计算的输入。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Each prefix option is advertised along with an 8-bit field of capabilities,as inputs for various routing calculations. Data type: Decimal,1 byte .

fixed.name: metrics
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：该路由的费用，与路由器LSA里接口费用使用相同的单位。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The cost of this route. Expressed in the same units as the interface costs in the router-LSAs. Data type: Hexadecimal,2 bytes.

variable.name: addressPrefix
variable.comment_cn: 描述：是对该前缀的编码，应为32位字的偶数倍，根据需要添补0位，该编码占用（前缀长度+31）/32个32位字。 数据类型：十六进制。
variable.comment_en: Description: Address Prefix is an encoding of the prefix itself as an even multiple of 32-bit words,padding with zero bits as necessary;this encoding consumes (PrefixLength + 31)/32) 32-bit words. Data type: Hexadecimal.

masked.name: type
masked.comment_cn: 描述：描述的接口类型。 数据类型：十六进制，长度为1个字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: The kind of interface being described. Data type: Hexadecimal,1 byte.

fixed.comment_cn: 描述：协议保留字段。 数据类型：十进制，长度为1个字节。 约束：必须为0。
fixed.comment_en: Description:protocol reserved field. Data type: Decimal,1 byte. Constraints:must be zero.

fixed.name: metrics
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：该路由器接口流量的费用。 数据类型：十进制，长度为2个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The cost of using this router interface, for outbound traffic. Data type: Decimal,2 bytes.

fixed.name: interfaceID
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：分配给所描述的接口ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Interface ID assigned to the interface. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: neighborInterface
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：邻居路由器在相连的链路上发送hello包的接口ID。 ：数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Interface ID the neighbor router has been advertising in hello packets sent on the attached link.. Data type: Decimal,4 bytes.

fixed.name: neighborRouterInterface
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：邻居路由器的路由器ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度为4个字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Router ID of the neighbor router. Data type: Decimal,4bytes.

block.name: ocsr
block.showname_cn: 通过路由器的可选能力支持
block.showname_en: The optional capabilities supported by the router

fixed.showname_cn: 通过路由器的可选能力支持(保留的)
fixed.showname_en: The optional capabilities supported by the router(reserved)

case.show_en: Response too big to be put into one packet
case.show_cn: 响应太大无法放入一个报文

proto.name: VRRP
proto.comment_cn: 提供路由备份及负载均衡功能

masked.name: vertype
masked.comment_cn: 描述：用于定义协议的版本和类型。 数据类型：十六进制，1字节。
masked.comment_en: Description: Define the version and message type. Data type; hexdecimal, 1 byte.

bit.name: version
bit.comment_cn: 描述：用于指定VRRP协议版本。 数据类型：十进制，长度4bit。 约束：本版本必须是2。
bit.comment_en: Description: Specific the version of VRRP. Data type: decimal, 4 bits. Constrainsts: This version must be 2.

bit.name: type
bit.comment_cn: 描述：用于定义报文类型。 数据类型：十进制，长度4bit。 约束：必须是1。

fixed.name: virRtrId
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：虚拟路由ID，当前报文描述的虚拟路由ID。 数据类型：十进制，长度1字节。 约束：取值1-255 无默认值。
fixed.comment_en: Description: The Virtual Router Identifier (VRID) field identifies the virtual router this packet is reporting status for. Data type: decimal,1 byte. Contraints: The value is in range 1 to 255. There is no default.

fixed.name: pri
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：优先级，为虚拟路由指定，路由器的优先级。高值等于高优先级。 数据类型：十进制，长度1个字节。 约束：Master路由的优先级必须为255，Backup路由默认值为100。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Priority,The priority field specifies the sending VRRP router's priority for the virtual router. Higher values equal higher priority. Data type: decimal,1 byte. Constraints: VRRP routers backing up a virtual router must use priority values between 1-254 (decimal).The default priority value for VRRP routers backing up a virtual router is 100 (decimal)

fixed.name: countIpAddr
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：IP地址数，指定报文携带的IP地址数。 数据类型：十进制，长度1字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Count of IP Address,The number of IP addresses contained in this VRRP advertisement. Data type: decimal, 1 byte.

fixed.name: authtype
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：认证类型，指定安全认证策略。版本2中已取消。 数据类型：十进制，长度1字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Authentication type, Specifics Authentication type.No used in version 2. Data type: decimal, 1 bytes.

fixed.name: advint
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：通告时间间隔，指定报文发送时间间隔。 数据类型：十进制，长度1字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Advertisement interval.Specifics advertisement interval. Data type: decimal, 1 byte.

fixed.name: chksum
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：校验和。 数据类型：十六进制，长度2字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: CheckSum. Data type: hexdecimal, 2 bytes.

loop.name: iplist
loop.comment_cn: 描述：关联IP地址列表，组成虚拟路由的实际路由地址列表,用于处理未配置的路由。 约束：列表IP地址个数=IP地址数。
loop.comment_en: Description: Associate IP list.One or more IP addresses that are associated with the virtual router.The number of addresses included is specified in the 'Count IP Addrs' field. These fields are used for troubleshooting misconfigured routers.

fixed.name: ip
fixed.showname_en: IP address that are associated with virtural router
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：关联IP地址。 数据类型：十进制，长度4字节。
fixed.comment_en: Description: IP address that are associated with virtural router. Data type: decimal, 1 byte.

fixed.name: authdata1
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：认证数据，兼容版本1。 数据类型：十六进制，长度4个字节。 约束：版本2中发送端必须置该字段为0，接受端必须忽略该字段。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Authentication data.The authentication string is currently only used to maintains backwards compatibility with RFC 2338。 Data type: hexdecimal, 8 bytes. Contraints:It should be set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.

fixed.name: authdata2
fixed.comment_cn: 描述：认证数据，兼容版本1。 数据类型：十六进制，长度4个字节。 约束：版本2中发送端必须置该字段为0，接受端必须忽略该字段。
fixed.comment_en: Description: Authentication data.The authentication string is currently only used to maintains backwards compatibility with RFC 2338。 Data type: hexdecimal, 8 bytes. Contraints:It should be set to zero on transmission and ignored on reception.

case.show_en: Reserved(This authentication type is reserved to maintain backwards compatibility with RFC 2338.,see rfc2338)
Reserved(This authentication type is reserved to maintain backwards compatibility with RFC 2338.,see rfc2338)
